idea:
An investment platform that enables individual and institutional investors invest in rooftop solar projects and get high returns. We aim to securitise rooftop solar panels. It enables rooftop owners to get cheaper electricity and avoid high capital investment needed for solar panels. Investors get an opportunity to invest in renewable energy and increase the adoption of green energy in India, incentivized by high internal rate of returns.


www.unergia.net
name: Abhimanhan Energy Pvt. Ltd.

idea:
Avisa biotech is start-up in Biotechnology focused on Microbial Metabolites for Nutritional and Nutraceuticals applications.
We are looking for Investments or JV opportunities to commercialise the technologies we have developed .
Algal and Fungal biotechnology is the core expertise of Avisa .
We have successfully scaled up the Algal DHA and Fungal Melanin technology at 100 Liters fermentation level in our lab .
Purification and downstream of DHA is also completed .
Looking for Investments or JV opportunities to commercialise the Technology and start the production .
Other products in R & D pipeline .
Melanin from Fungi . ( Technology ready for commercialization and scale up . )
DHA Phospolipids and other phospholipid
ARA ( Omega 6 ) and EPA ( omega 3 )
Phycocynine
Phycoerythrin
Exopolysaccharides
Vegetarian or Vegan Vitamin D3 from Algae
Oligosaccharides – Specially FOS and MOS
Mycoprotein for Animal feed and Meat substitutes from Algae .
Cancer Drug – Texol by Endophytic route
Recombinant protein production using Algae and cynobacteria
Avisa Biotech seeks to harness the enormous microbial biodiversity of India in finding solutions for the Nutrition, Pharmaceutical, Industrial and Environment sectors.
 AVISA has been promoted by a group of Scientists and Entrepreneurs, with over 100 man-years of experience in microbial technology and its commercialisation.
With its Developmental facility based out of Kochi, Kerala, AVISA is constantly developing technologies that can have a significant impact on the lives of people, across geographical and economic boundaries. Key among the various technologies for Nutrition and Pharma being developed are microbial production of Omega Fatty Acids ( DHA ,ARA and EPA ) , Food grade pigments, Specialty Probiotics and antioxidant
name: AVISA BIOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Share Acre offers the service of fractional ownership for secondary homes. Fractional Ownership is a form of ownership that allows aspirational buyers to own a fully furnished home, at a fraction of the total asking price. Unlike a Timeshare, along with owning a percentage share in the property under this form of ownership, buyers have the ability to use, rent, and further sell their share to realize the benefits of property appreciation. This is made possible by our platform bringing together like-minded individuals to buy, own and split the cost of a secondary home


Please watch video on :https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gxbt61mUK3s
name: SHARED ACRE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We specialize in implementing high-quality games and captivating experiences on widely accessible and cost-efficient platforms such as Android and iOS

SpritePlay is an award-winning gaming startup based out of Mumbai, India. We bring stories to life using cutting edge digital technologies. Our specialties include: Creating curated AR, VR & MR experiences and apps; Learning games for Gen Z staff training; and Gamification of various processes across all verticals.
name: SpritePlay

idea:
1. Manufacturing and installation of ballistic coats on structures.

I have developed a product to be installed on structures specially on terrace and exterior walls to make it stronger. This product comes under waterproofing but can be modified according to client's needs.


2. Manufacturing of bulletproof armor and shields.

Under Make in India initiative if this product is made then it will be cost saving. Using special type of Carbon Fibers, Aramid and specific type of Resins thus making it light weight it can withstand bullets.


3. Designing prototype for electronic non lethal and lethal weapons using light and sound waves.

I am on theory rite now but it can be made practical and put in use by Military and crowd controlling without harming the miscreants. But the other prototype of light is lethal and I am trying to make it in such a way that it will change the total system of weapons of our country (imagining use of laser and batteries instead of bullets)


4. Amplidyne

I came across this concept just to generate huge power in small devices using motorized power amplifier and super capacitors. Can be used in drones, exo-skeleton, rail guns and even in the laser blaster which i am working on.
name: Sarnaik's Solutions
